text: Santa Cecilia is a district of the La Cruz canton, in the Guanacaste province of Costa Rica. == Geography == Santa Cecilia has an area of km² and an elevation of metres. ==Villages== Administrative center of the district is the village of Santa Cecilia. Other villages in the district are Armenia, Belice, Bellavista, Brisas, Caoba, Esperanza, Flor del Norte, Lajosa, Marías, Palmares, San Antonio, San Cristóbal, San Rafael, San Vicente, Santa Elena, Sardina, and Virgen. == Demographics == For the 2011 census, Santa Cecilia had a population of inhabitants. == Transportation == === Road transportation === The district is covered by the following road routes: *25px National Route 4 *25px National Route 170 == References == Category:Districts of Guanacaste Province Category:Populated places in Guanacaste Province
title: Santa Cecilia District
